divs: Sighting DetailsWent to have a smoke looked up saw three glowing cigar looking objects flying fast then stopped mid air turned right and flew off after complete stop hovered then turned direction whole object glowed bright white no blinking lights on it no sound air outside became warm for a split second when hovering directly above a jet flew in thier flight path all three stopped in mid air and turned right and flew off at crazy speed left a light streak in sky that stayed approximately one min after they disapeered sky went from cold to warm and smelled like someone lite a bunch of matches lasted a second or two, this was seen in longview Washington three other neighbors witnessed this event.
